meanings.definition: A protective plate installed at the bottom of a door to prevent damage from kicks.
meanings.sent1: The kickplates on the doors at school keep them looking nice.
meanings.sent2: I noticed the kickplates on the doors were scuffed from all the foot traffic.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student tried to kick the kickplates, thinking they were like soccer balls.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a set of shiny kickplates, guarding her emotions from harm.
meanings.sent5: The shiny kickplates gleamed in the sunlight, reminding everyone to watch their step.
